help.header: DepNudge - Update your Node.js dependencies to their latest versions
help.check_option: -c, --check         Only check for outdated packages (don't update)
help.install_option: -i, --install       Install undefined dependencies found in code
help.example_install: depnudge --install          # Find and install undefined dependencies
help.example_specific: depnudge axios lodash       # Update specific packages
help.example_yes: depnudge axios --yes        # Update axios without confirmation
